body:
Hi Agus,

I' merging both into 1 but I haven't finished the implementation ([https://github.com/mostaphaRoudsari/Honeybee/issues/80](https://github.com/mostaphaRoudsari/Honeybee/issues/80)). For now you can just use the old component. Except for Mass2Zone it should work fine. I will check your files once I have this implemented.

Mostapha
